conversation.question: what is avalanche method?
conversation.answer: I couldn't connect to the ai money coach service. Please try again later.

conversation.question: what is avalanche method?
conversation.answer: The avalanche method, as described in "Debt-Free to Financial Freedom," involves paying off debts starting with the highest interest rate first to save money on interest. At the same time, maintain minimum payments on other debts. This approach reduces overall interest paid and speeds up debt freedom.

conversation.question: How to be financially secure?
conversation.answer: Based on "Debt-Free to Financial Freedom," achieve financial security by: 1) Eliminating all debt systematically using the debt snowball method. 2) Building an emergency fund starting with $1,000. 3) Gradually saving 3‚Äì6 months of living expenses. 4) Creating a budget and sticking to it consistently.
